attributes.description:
This is a Brand-New Vehicle. You at the right place for your automotive needs. 
Rated # 1 in Service! Nationwide delivery, Fantastic Trade-in offers, In-house vehicle finance services offered with all major banks.  
We specialise in online sales, no need to leave your home.  
* All specials and discounted stock are subject to in-house finance 
* Listed price excludes all fees/costs.  
* Some pictures might vary from actual vehicle; we do our best to ensure accuracy ?? 
Contact us today, we are on standby for your enquiry.

attributes.description:
2018 TOYOTA HILUX 2.4 GD-6 DOUBLE CAB ENGINE VERY CLEAN NICE SEAT Mileage: 92000 km. Color: White Price: R389, 995 Neg


BLACKLISTED ARE ALSO WELCOME TO APPLY FOR FINANCE


Features: NICE SEAT INTERIOR As Good As New Car, 3x3 Point Rear Seat Belts, Driver airbag and Passenger airbag, Adjustable Seats, With Spare Tire, Wheel, 18’’ inch Meg’s, Smash & grab, Anti theft system, ABS, Airbags, Air condition, Spotless, Nice In Color Low Mileage On Clock, Central Locking, and Gear Locking, New Tires, Alloy Wheel's, Spotlights In Front, Alarm and Mobilize Power Steering, and Adjustable steering, Electric Windows, Electric Mirrors, Aircon, Factory fitted Louder Mp3 Radio, Car Very Clean Inside And Outside, with Average Fuel of 7.1 liter per 100km. Excellent Body Condition, Excellent Interior Condition, Excellent Mechanical Condition, Excellent Overall Condition. This car is still very clean and has a Road worthy certificate. 


Definitely A Must See Please Call/WhatsApp DE REV AUTOS to View All Vehicle.

1. We stock a wide variety of quality, used, low kilometer vehicles such as sedans, hatchbacks, SUVs and bakkies 
2. All our second hand vehicles for sale undergo a stringent 116-point quality assurance check 
3. Over 1,000 popular makes and models of used cars available 
4. Finance and Insurance arranged on the spot
5. Finance available with all banks Neat and Immaculate Condition.
 
Going for both CASH / FINANCE! If you would like to come view or tests drive the vehicle, we are situated at 658 LOUIS BOTHA AVEUNE WYNBERG SANDTON JOHANNESBURG 2090. Operating hours are from 08:00 till 17:00 Mon - Fri and 08:00 till 14:00 Sat. ALTERNATIVE CONTACT: CALL 011 485 1186 OR WHATS APP 0784890344, 0810023905

attributes.description:
A must see! Extremely well kept vehicle with BMW motorplan to August 2023. Full service history with no comments. Lots of extras: Adaptive M Suspension M Sport package Panorama glass sliding/tilting sun roof, electrically operated Multifunctional instrument display Mineral White Metallic Leather Dakota Black Double-spoke style 469 M, 20" mixed tyres Sport automatic transmission Trailer tow hitch, fully electrically operated Rear view camera Roof rails Aluminium satinated Interior and Exterior mirror with automatic anti-dazzle function Seat adjustment, electric with memory for driver's seat Sport seats for driver and front passenger Interior trim finishers Fine Brushed Aluminium Headlamp washer system Xenon headlights Extended Light Package LED fog lights Hi-Fi loudspeaker system Smartphone Integration Steering wheel M Leather M Aerodynamic kit BMW Individual high-gloss Shadow Line Anthracite roof lining Telematics and Online Service provider control

Bank finance can be arranged.
